data.message: How do I contact Facebook? My account says temporarily blocked. I am using my mom's Facebook to ask. Can someone help me?My account name is julie Justice.

replies.message: Hey Julie. Here are possible reasons why your account may have been disabled: http://on.fb.me/1UG5yL9. If you believe that it was disabled by mistake, you can submit an appeal in the link above. Thanks. -Rey

I already know why. It's because some jerk reported my account as fake. So facebook wants me to send some identification. First, justice is not my real last name. I  care about privacy and i should have the right to use a different last name for privacy issues. With that being said, I will put my real last name on if they let me into my account. But, since it isn't my real last name, I can't find anyone to talk to about the issue. How can i fix this ??? i think it's really crappy of someone to report me for no reason. I have a right to my privacy.
Either you create a new account or you send your government id etc to fb.

@Facebook: You also temporarily blocked me since December 14. I am confident that I am a responsible Facebook user.  I've already uploaded my government issued ID but until now my account is still disabled.  I have lots of treasured pictures in that account. I am using that for more than 5 years, without foul words or insulting statement or nude photos or videos. Please unblock my Facebook account before Christmas! God bless.....  - Michelle Arines Hernandez, Philippines
@Facebook: I've already submitted an appeal to you a lot of times but  until now my 5-year-old Facebook account is disabled!
